page.title: 07The Mayor of Denbigh's day
page.content: There are{three tiers of local {Government}_{County,District and Town. I am involved in all through my employment with the County, as {Councillor}with the{Glyndwr District and with the{Town}as{Mayor. My day starts at{6:30am}and at{7:25 I drive{17miles}to{Shire Hall,Mold,}to begin work at{8am}as{Head of Further {Education.}The section deals with students' grants, adult classes, Youth training schemes, youth clubs etc. and spends approximately{Â£7\ million p.a. At{9:30}I travel{12miles}to{Ruthin for a meeting of the{District Council as{Councillor}for{Denbigh West}and {Henllan Ward.}I return to{Mold}where I am involved in interviewing students; correspondence, preparation of reports etc. I leave at{4:15}and return home for tea before beginning a busy evening as{Mayor.
